overview: What more could be said about the Platinum Princess of Porn? For her millions of devoted fans, every adjective has been used to describe her delectable breasts, her magnificent body, and her fiery brand of sexuality. In the business where performers come and go, SEKA has proven to be the all-time champion of erotica. Passionate, and yet always aloof, she's a unique combination of Greta Garbo and Marilyn Monroe. You will love this collection of scenes that show SEKA at her hottest. Her scene with the legendary John Holmes is one you will not forget!
tagline: A prurient peek at the Platinum Princess of Porn... Seka! Get a taste!
title: My Sister Seka
